document_data.name: Speeding Trident
document_data.mainbody: '''''Speeding trident''''' was a [[divine]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] that conjured forth a [[trident]]-shaped projectile of water.
document_data.Effects: When cast, a ''speeding trident'' of solidified water launched forth from the [[cleric]] towards its target. The ''trident'' was strong enough that its tines could pierce normal [[armor]].
document_data.History:
The name of this spell appeared on the surface of the [[Umberlant]] [[relic]], the ''[[Orglara]]''.

There was an improved version of this spell, called ''[[battle trident]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required three drops of water and three points made up of ferrous metal.
